item.description:
This race is held every Tuesday from April through September, it costs $5, it is a trail run. The run starts at 6:30, you need to be there early to register.

There are usually about 100 runners of all skill levels. There are prizes, cookies, and fruit after the race.

Enter these coordinates,  42.312,-72.653  , into google maps, a GPS, or a smart phone map app, and they will get you to the starting line. (Prince Street ends where Burts Pit Road begins)

Email me with any questions.
item.name: Timed Run in Northampton
